channel.description: Recent content in Recent Posts on OneSentForth

item.title: Stock and Flow
item.description: Austin Kleon wrote a great book about creativity that I’ve read multiple times. It’s called Show Your Work, and I highly recommend it for anyone who’s ever wondered aloud, “How do I get my stuff out there? How do I get noticed? How do I find an audience?” There’s a great section in the book called “Stock and Flow,” where Kleon mentions an article that economist Robin Sloan wrote in 2010.

item.title: First Post
item.description: This will not interest most of you. But I wanted to include some technical info about the site.
